Each share of Class A Common Stock was issued upon the conversion of one share of Class B Common Stock at the election of the Reporting Person. The price reported in Column 4 is a weighted average price. The shares were sold in multiple transactions at prices ranging from $718.09 to $719.08, inclusive. The Reporting Person undertakes to provide to any security holder of Alphabet Inc. or the staff of the Securities and Exchange Commission, upon request, full information regarding the number of shares sold at each separate price within the ranges set forth in footnotes (2) through (25) to this Form 4. The shares were sold in multiple transactions at prices ranging from $719.11 to $720.10, inclusive. The shares were sold in multiple transactions at prices ranging from $720.24 to $721.23, inclusive. The shares were sold in multiple transactions at prices ranging from $710.34 to $711.33, inclusive. All shares are exercisable as of the transaction date. There is no expiration date for the Issuer's Class B Common Stock.
All sale transactions reported in this Form 4 were effected pursuant to a Rule 10b5-1 Trading Plan adopted by the Reporting Person.
